content:
### Bug fixes

* [FTP:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.ftp.md) Fixed issue where incorrect paths were displayed when using the node.
* [Wait:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.wait.md) Fixed issue when receiving multiple files using On Webhook Call operation.
* [Webhook:](/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.webhook/index.md) Fixed issue when receiving multiple files.
